txt.en: 'The forest creatures come closer to town everyday, and they're much fiercer too.'
'Felling trees isn't as easy as it looks, that's a fact!'
'Strong arm and a sharp axe's all a stout hobbit needs to get by... well, that and a good cook-pan.'
'One day, these trees'll be furniture, carts, and such all throughout the Shire... one day....'
